titles.title: A resolution commemorating September 17, 2022, as "Constitution Day" and celebrating the signing of the Constitution.
A resolution commemorating September 17, 2022, as "Constitution Day" and celebrating the signing of the Constitution.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution celebrates the signing of the U.S. Constitution by recognizing Constitution Day on September 17, 2022.
